description:
This package creates a shortcut to the SharePoint Hive-folder (14-, 15-folder depending on your version).

There is a second package "SharePoint.HiveShortcut.Explorer" which creates a shortcut in your Explorer links.
summary: This package creates a shortcut to the SharePoint Hive-folder (14-, 15-folder depending on your version) on your Desktop.
author: Max Melcher
